00042 typedef enum {
00043         TWOLAME_AUTO_MODE = -1, 
00044         TWOLAME_STEREO = 0,             
00045         TWOLAME_JOINT_STEREO,   
00046         TWOLAME_DUAL_CHANNEL,   
00047         TWOLAME_MONO,                   
00048         TWOLAME_NOT_SET
00049 } TWOLAME_MPEG_mode;
